named-query.name: GET_STUDENT_DETAILS
named-query.query: SELECT NEW com.infy.cpc.fas.model.StudentDetails (a.id, a.name, a.dob, a.sex, b.address, b.landmark) FROM User a INNER JOIN Address b ON a.id=b.userid and a.id= :id

named-query.name: GET_STUDENT_DETAILS_HQL
named-query.query: SELECT b FROM User b WHERE b.id = :id

named-query.name: GET_ADDRESS_DETAILS_HQL
named-query.query: SELECT b FROM Address b WHERE b.userid = :id
